title: Over here: Irish music and dance in England
creator_credit: Associates Film Productions, Iain Bruce and Carlo Gebler
brief_description: Uses archive film to explain why so many Irish-born people live in Britain and records examples of the Irish tradition at work there. Reveals the rich tradition of music, song and dance which the Irish have brought with them to Britain.
